titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to provide cost share assistance to construct reservoir structures for the storage of water in rural areas, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8488)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Research.

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Research, Conservation, Forestry and General Legislation

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 7/1/1993--Introduced. Amends the Watershed Protection and Flood Prevention Act to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to provide assistance for rural reservoir construction.
